description: Streamdeck neo not detected at all. I hope a major update including new models is on its way...
Almost everything works in the way that you would expect it to work. Look forward to future updates and more plugins that will make this application even better.

Still having trouble figuring out some things, but I imagine I'm just missing something.

SOOOOOO SO Excited for this.

This is amazing because the other solutions are down right bad or just dont work. Its great to see somthing ive been dreaming to have on linux. It has OBS support, and many other addons to help make stream deck work EASY on linux.
summary: Finally a Stream Deck software that works!

description:
First impression is great! GUI is good, but could need some tweaking since it's not always obvious that clicking "this" will open "that" etc. Nothing major. 

Something more serious is that it doesn't currently work after waking from suspend, but I've read that the devs are on it, and I'm sure it'll be fixed in the near future. 

This could finally be an actual fully functioning stream deck app for Linux if the dev(s) continue to work on it, which they should be, since they've done one hell of a job thus far.
Simply the best ever created Stream Deck Software for Linux ever!

Super efficient application. It worked out of the box, and it as a lot of pluggins.

Maybe the UI could be improved a bit, but it's really not an issue
